name: bewcloud
description: Bewcloud is a self-hosted personal cloud platform that helps users store, manage, and sync files across devices. It focuses on ease of use, privacy, and simplicity, making it a lightweight alternative to larger cloud services.

features.title: Personal Cloud
features.description: Store and manage files on your own server. Complete data ownership

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Access files from any device automatically. Seamless synchronization

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Self-hosted solution ensures data never leaves your control. No third-party access

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Easy-to-use web UI for file management. Intuitive navigation

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Minimal resource requirements for efficient operation. Runs on modest hardware

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Share files and folders with others securely. Controlled access

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Manage files from smartphones and tablets. Access anywhere
